CreateSpace.name: CreateSpace
CreateSpace.description: Grants permission to create a new private re:Post in your account

DeleteSpace.name: DeleteSpace
DeleteSpace.description: Grants permission to delete a private re:Post from your account

DeregisterAdmin.name: DeregisterAdmin
DeregisterAdmin.description: Grants permission to remove an administrator to a private re:Post in your account

GetSpace.name: GetSpace
GetSpace.description: Grants permission to get the description for a private re:Post in your account

ListSpaces.name: ListSpaces
ListSpaces.description: Grants permission to list all private re:Posts in your account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a resource

RegisterAdmin.name: RegisterAdmin
RegisterAdmin.description: Grants permission to add an administrator to a private re:post in your account

SendInvites.name: SendInvites
SendInvites.description: Grants permission to send invites to users of a private re:Post in your account

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

UpdateSpace.name: UpdateSpace
UpdateSpace.description: Grants permission to update a private re:Post in your account
